abstract: Google‘s acquisition of video-sharing site YouTube was driven by a culture of “nerd logic,” which has slammed the company headfirst into the culture of New York’s Big Media, Clive Thompson wrote in New York magazine. And, in a development that many had predicted, the deal has made Google the target of a major lawsuit from Viacom, which contends its copyrighted materials are being used without its permission.
lead_paragraph: Google‘s acquisition of video-sharing site YouTube was driven by a culture of “nerd logic,” which has slammed the company headfirst into the culture of New York’s Big Media, Clive Thompson wrote in New York magazine. And, in a development that many had predicted, the deal has made Google the target of a major lawsuit from Viacom, which contends its copyrighted materials are being used without its permission.

abstract: SKS Microfinance, a fast-growing Indian company that provides financing for entrepeneurs, has received an $11.5 million injection with Sequoia Capital putting up most of the funds. Sequoia, which has made such savvy previous investments as those in Google, Yahoo and YouTube, was joined in the round by Unitus Equity Fund, Vinod Khosla, Ravi Reddy, Odyssey Capital and prior investor Sidbi.
lead_paragraph: SKS Microfinance, a fast-growing Indian company that provides financing for entrepeneurs, has received an $11.5 million injection with Sequoia Capital putting up most of the funds. Sequoia, which has made such savvy previous investments as those in Google, Yahoo and YouTube, was joined in the round by Unitus Equity Fund, Vinod Khosla, Ravi Reddy, Odyssey Capital and prior investor Sidbi.

headline.main: Sequoia Capital Backs Financier for Indian Entrepreneurs
